    • Constructor Detail

      • AppboyLruImageLoader

    • Method Detail

      • renderUrlIntoView

        public void renderUrlIntoView(android.content.Context context,
                              java.lang.String imageUrl,
                              android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                              AppboyViewBounds viewBounds)
        Description copied from interface: IAppboyImageLoader
        Loads the image at the imageUrl into the imageView. If the image's bitmap is not already cached, the bitmap will be retrieved directly from the URL and the bitmap will be cached. This method may be called from the UI thread.
        Specified by:
        renderUrlIntoView in interface IAppboyImageLoader
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        imageUrl - The url of the image to be rendered into the imageView.
        imageView - The imageView object that will contain the image.
        viewBounds - The bounds for the destination view. If null, no remote bitmap sampling will occur.
        See Also:
        IAppboyImageLoader.renderUrlIntoView(Context, String, ImageView, AppboyViewBounds)

      • getBitmapFromUrl

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromUrl(android.content.Context context,
                                                java.lang.String imageUrl,
                                                AppboyViewBounds viewBounds)
        Description copied from interface: IAppboyImageLoader
        Attempts to retrieve the bitmap representing the imageUrl's image from the imageLoader's caches. If no such bitmap is cached, the bitmap will be retrieved directly from the URL and the bitmap will be cached. This method is blocking and thus may not be called from the UI thread.
        Specified by:
        getBitmapFromUrl in interface IAppboyImageLoader
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        imageUrl - The url of the image whose bitmap is being retrieved.
        viewBounds - The bounds for the destination view. If null, no remote bitmap sampling will occur.
        Returns:
        The bitmap representing the image located at the imageUrl.
        See Also:
        IAppboyImageLoader.getBitmapFromUrl(Context, String, AppboyViewBounds)

      • setOffline

        public void setOffline(boolean isOffline)
        Description copied from interface: IAppboyImageLoader
        Set this image loader offline. In offline mode, the image loader should only load locally cached images.
        Specified by:
        setOffline in interface IAppboyImageLoader
        Parameters:
        isOffline - whether this image loader is offline.
        See Also:
        IAppboyImageLoader.setOffline(boolean)

      • deleteStoredData

        public static void deleteStoredData(android.content.Context context)
        Deletes the stored data generated from an instance of this class from the device's internal storage.
